title: PID Synergy Data
summary: Provides 4 sklearn built-in datasets (breast_cancer: 569×30, wine: 178×13, iris: 150×4, diabetes_binarized: 442×10) formatted for PID synergy matrix computation, timing scalability assessment, MI comparison, and cross-subsample stability analysis. Each dataset sample is a separate example with JSON feature-value input, string target output, and metadata fields (fold assignment, feature names, task type, n_classes, row index). Total: 1,339 examples across 4 datasets spanning 4 to 30 features for scaling analysis. All datasets are well-established UCI/sklearn benchmarks with meaningful, domain-interpretable features suitable for information-theoretic analysis.
